title: Physical & Awareness MoCap Gesture Animation Pack
description: 117 MoCap gesture animation clips based around physical activity and sensory awareness. Motions retargeted to the UE4 mannequin.
longDescription:
Click here to view demo video


This is a set of 117 motion capture gesture animation clips themed around physical activity and sensory awareness. The motions have been retargeted to the UE mannequin. They can be used in games and other projects where you need gesture motions for NPC characters or player emotes. Some of the longer sequences are suitable for use with film sequences. Where possible we have included shortened versions that are more suitable for use as player/NPC emotes and gestures.


If you have any questions please email us at contact@awesomedog.com

technicalDetails:
Features:

 117 motion capture animation clips retargeted to UE mannequin

Note: This includes variations of some animations.

For example some animations may have shorter versions for game emotes or longer versions for film sequences.


 All the animations have been looped

 Source FBX files included in Source folder for editing & import into earlier engines than 4.24

 A showcase level scene is included to help easily review the dances


Rigged to Epic skeleton: YES

If rigged to the Epic skeleton, IK bones are included: YES

Number of Animations: 117

Animation types (Root Motion/In-place): Root Motion

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Documentation: https://awesomedog.com/unreal-mocap-pack-help
